00082 
00087     virtual XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE_QUALIFIER DOMElement * getElement(void) const = 0;
00088 
00090 
00093 
00100     virtual int getUnverifiedKeyBindingSize(void) const = 0;
00101 
00102     /*
00103      * \brief Obtain an UnverifiedKeyBinding item
00104      *
00105      * @param item Index of the item to return (0 = first element)
00106      * @returns the UnverifiedKeyBinding referenced by "item"
00107      */
00108 
00109     virtual XKMSUnverifiedKeyBinding * getUnverifiedKeyBindingItem(int item) const = 0;
00110 
00111     /*
00112      * \brief Append a new UnverifiedKeyBinding element
00113      *
00114      * Allows callers to append a new UnverifiedKeyBinding item.
00115      * The item is initially empty of KeyInfo elements - these must be added
00116      * by the caller.
00117      *
00118      * @returns the newly created UnverifiedKeyBinding object (already inserted
00119      * in the LocateResult
00120      */
00121 
00122     virtual XKMSUnverifiedKeyBinding * appendUnverifiedKeyBindingItem(void ) = 0;
